sentences.en: A bluish mist hung in the air.
sentences.cn: 一层淡蓝色的薄雾弥漫在空中。

sentences.en: Chinese basic colors word includes: Red orange yellow malachite green bluish violet.
sentences.cn: 汉语的基本颜色词有: 赤橙黄绿青蓝紫.

sentences.en: Her skin had a bluish tinge .
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤微微透着蓝色。

sentences.en: His lips were bluish, his cheeks blanched.
sentences.cn: 他嘴唇微微发青, 脸色发白.

sentences.en: It always looks kind of bluish.
sentences.cn: 它看起来总带点儿蓝色.

sentences.en: Mist clung there among the bluish tree shapes, beyond range of the lamps.
sentences.cn: 在灯光照不到的那些苍茫的树身中间,暮霭凝聚着.

sentences.en: North American blackbird whose bluish - black plumage is rusty - edged in the fall.
sentences.cn: 北美洲乌鸫,其蓝黑色的羽毛在秋天呈现铁锈红色的边.

sentences.en: Some of these give a bluish or purplish tinge to the light.
sentences.cn: 其中的一些让蓝或紫色色调的光线.

sentences.en: The colors of rainbow: Red orange yellow malachite green bluish violet.
sentences.cn: 彩虹的颜色应为: 赤橙黄绿青蓝紫.

sentences.en: The day was hidden by a bluish haze.
sentences.cn: 天色被隐藏在一片蔚蓝的朦胧中.

sentences.en: The light emitted is bluish due to the use of blue glass.
sentences.cn: 由于使用蓝色玻璃,所以灯泡发出的光带有蓝色.

sentences.en: The smoke was bluish-black and thick.
sentences.cn: 那烟黑中带蓝，而且很浓。

sentences.en: The spectra of category 1 diamonds generally appeared as bluish fluorescence.
sentences.cn: 种类1的光谱一般出现泛蓝的荧光.

sentences.en: They painted it a light shade of bluish green.
sentences.cn: 他们把它画成了浅蓝绿色.

sentences.en: Winter mornings in many wood - burning valley towns are now shrouded in a bluish - gray haze.
sentences.cn: 目前,许多烧木材的河谷城镇,在冬季早晨经常缭绕着蓝灰色的烟雾.

words.tran_cn: 蓝色的；忧郁的，沮丧的；下流的
